scripts.build: npm run build:libs && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:user: npm run build:libs && npm run build -w apps/user
scripts.build:apps: npm run build -w apps/user && npm run build -w apps/auth && npm run build -w apps/contest
scripts.start:apps: npm run start -w apps/auth && npm run start -w apps/user && npm run start -w apps/contest
